Package org.bukkit.inventory.meta

Interface CrossbowMeta

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, ConfigurationSerializable, ItemMeta, PersistentDataHolder
    public interface CrossbowMeta
extends ItemMeta
    Represents metadata on a crossbow

      • setChargedProjectiles

        void setChargedProjectiles​(@Nullable
                           java.util.List<ItemStack> projectiles)
        Sets the projectiles charged on this item. Removes all projectiles when given null.
        Parameters:
        projectiles - the projectiles to set
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if one of the projectiles is not an arrow or firework rocket
